review: Want to crack open a skull with the tomahawk from Assassin's Creed III. Now you can. Want to perform brain surgery on the back of an ambulance with all your equipment falling out of it. Now you can. Want to go to space and peform surgery on Aliens! Now you can. If you are looking for a good laugh this holiday season, Surgeon Simulator 2013 is a must have. 10/10!
